pkgmetadata.longdescription: uacme is ACMEv2 client written in plain C, focusing on handling the protocol while leaving it up to the user to setup and complete the challenge, either by hand or by providing program or script to be executed. Program supports Elliptic Curve certificates and allows to use all popular challenge methods (http-01, dns-01 and tls-alpn-01). It can be build with GnuTLS, OpenSSL or mbedTLS as cypto library, allowing it to be used on variety of systems, including embedded devices. The optional tls-alpn-01 challenge support requires the use of GnuTLS.
